other_tests.findings: Results consistent with acute intermittent porphyria (AIP). Elevated faecal copro-porphyrins; porphobilinogen (PBG) deaminase in the low normal range.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Vomiting stopped abruptly 8 days after admission but another episode commenced before discharge and lasted 4 days.

other_tests.findings: PBG levels were 12 (first episode), 3 (remission), total porphyrins 1183 (first episode), 318 (remission), uroporphyrin 47 (first episode), coproporphyrin 1124 (first episode).
other_tests.changes_over_time: PBG levels showed decrease over time; resolved symptoms after intravenous haematin administration.
